user.title: OpenData South Tyrol
user.description:
This integration uses data provided by [Open Data South Tyrol](https://data.civis.bz.it/dataset) under the Creative Commons CC0 1.0 Universal - Public Domain Dedication (CC0 1.0) license. Not all available data types are supported by this integration.

Supported data types: {supported_types}

Integration version: {version}.

The configuration data is retrieved in real-time from the provided API, and loading may take a few seconds.

language.title: Language Selection

group.title: Group Selection
group.description:
The data is organized into thematic groups.
Select the group that contains the data you are interested in.
This choice will determine which datasets will be available in the next step.

fields.title: Field Selection
fields.description:
Select the field to monitor.
This value will become a sensor in Home Assistant.
A preview of the current value is displayed for each field.

API URL: {api_url}
